definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
paragraph/section/segment/stage (of a process)/classifier for stories, periods of time, lengths of thread etc

sentences.english: HF radar backscatter from the ocean surface shows nonlinearities and time variation of its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 高频波段海洋回波信号表现了非线性和频谱时变性。

sentences.english: The thesis presents the research and design of a V-band frequency quadrupler.
sentences.chinese: 本文对V波段有源倍频器进行了设计研究。

sentences.english: The double-wave band laser was studied theoretically.
sentences.chinese: 在理论上探讨了红黄双波段激光产生的机理。

sentences.english: This study aims on the spectral features and sensitive spectrum wave band in the apple florescence .
sentences.chinese: 旨在探索苹果花期的光谱特征和敏感波段。

sentences.english: C-band pulse Doppler weather radar receiver is described in detail in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种C波段脉冲多普勒天气雷达接收机。

sentences.english: The two-band British EQ is famous for its warm, musical sound.
sentences.chinese: 这两个波段均衡器，是英国的热情，著名的音乐声。

sentences.english: This Paper describes data records based on C-band tracking radar and off-line processing.
sentences.chinese: 描述C波段跟踪雷达数据记录和脱机处理情况。

sentences.english: Certain waves can be used in rapid drying devices that installed in web printing presses.
sentences.chinese: 某些波段可用于卷筒纸印刷机上的快速干燥装置。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a multiband antenna device and a communication terminal device.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种多波段天线设备和通信终端装置。

sentences.english: Noble winney owned a very good all-band receiver.
sentences.chinese: 诺布尔温尼有一台非常好的全波段收音机。

sentences.english: This thesis presents the design and manufacture of a V-band frequency quadrupler.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了V波段四倍频器的设计和研制方法。

sentences.english: Most of the invisibility cloaks that have been demonstrated to date conceal objects at frequencies that are not detectable by the human eye.
sentences.chinese: 大部分隐身斗篷都是在非可见光波段隐藏物体。

sentences.english: What if we could use other waves to surf the internet?
sentences.chinese: 要是我们可以使用其他的波段上网冲浪又会如何呢？

sentences.english: The second conductor 104 resonates in a portion of the high band.
sentences.chinese: 第二导体104在高波段的一部分内谐振。

sentences.english: The experimental results show that there exists a strong photovoltage signal at long wavelength bands.
sentences.chinese: 实验结果表明，在长波段有强的光电压信号。

sentences.english: Many chemical agent explosives show characteristic spectral features in the terahertz.
sentences.chinese: 大多数生物战剂爆炸物在此波段有特征吸收。

definition: to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
bull market (prices appear to be rising)
poor prospects in the short term (finance)
Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE), abbr. for 上海證券交易所|上海证券交易所[Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3]
good prospects in the short term (finance)
